sources.title: Infection [2004]
sources.description: Infection  ( 感染 ,  Kansen )  is a 2004 Japanese  horror film  directed by  Masayuki Ochiai . The film is about a run-down hospital where a doctor's mistake unwittingly creates horrific consequences for the staff at the hospital. The film was adapted from Ochiai's earlier screenplay from  Tales of the Unusual .
